title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: 1.Principles of metallographic sample preparation and observation.2.Solidification of metals and alloys, and determination of phase diagrams.3.Observation of macrostructures.4.Work hardening of metals and alloys and determination of recrystallization parameters.5.Study of different types of eutectic microstructures.6.Heat treatment of different plain carbon steels, and correlation of their microstructures and hardness.7.Microstructures of some commercially available non-ferrous alloys.8.Microstructures, compositions and hardness of different components used in a bicycle.
